title: .NET Book Zero: What the C or C++ Programmer Needs to Know about C# and the .NET Framework
author: Charles Petzold
description: An introduction to C# and the Microsoft .NET Framework for programmers who have experience with C or C++.

title: C# Programming Yellow Book, The Cheese Edition
author: Rob Miles
description: An introduction to computer programming using C# language used by the Department of Computer Science in the University of Hull as the basis of the First Year programming course.

title: Dissecting a CSharp Application: Inside SharpDevelop
author: Wrox Press
description: This book teaches advanced .NET programming techniques by getting an insiders' look at SharpDevelop, a complete Integrated Development Environment written in C#.
